node.display_long_description:
“《SUPERHOT VR》让人无法自拔”- Polygon

屡获殊荣且大受欢迎的《SUPERHOT VR》将谨慎的战略和放纵的厮杀合而为一，给你带来最完整的VR动作游戏体验。只有你移动，时间才会流动。

没有再生的生命条，也没有预先放置的弹药掉落。你孤身一人，势单力薄，弹尽粮绝。唯有抓起敌人掉落的武器进行厮杀和射击，操纵时间躲过枪林弹雨。 
 
你从未玩过这样的游戏，这游戏有些不同之处。真实被抛诸脑后。 

深受无数玩家喜爱，经过进一步打磨的不朽之作，Quest推出最完整的《SUPERHOT VR》体验。 

呕心沥血重新打造出原汁原味的风貌。不受任何干扰，全神贯注于《SUPERHOT》招牌慢动作战斗的猛烈攻势。关卡中的金字塔都消失了。如同跳着死亡之舞的舞者，在动作间不受阻碍地流动。 

不受拘束，也不妥协。 

大脑是软件
现在你自由了。

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
// SUPERHOT VR on Oculus Quest v1.14
> Added experimental 120 FPS mode for Quest 2

nodes.title: Experimental 120 FPS Mode!
nodes.body_text:
Hi friends!

In our latest update 1.14, we’ve added experimental support for 120 FPS. From the Settings menu, you can toggle the new experimental mode On or Off. When enabled, SUPERHOT VR will render up to a super-fast 120 frames per second.

We don’t expect you to encounter any problems with the 120 FPS mode, the game should be smoother to play and better than ever. However, rendering at 120 FPS is experimental so please disable it if you encounter any issues!

Have fun, spread the system,

SUPERHOT Team

nodes.title: 5 years, 10k reviews and 1 million copies sold!
nodes.body_text:
Hi Friends!

It’s been a wild ride ever since we released the original, non VR, very flat SUPERHOT on February 25th, 2016. 5 years ago. Half a decade.1825 ish days. That’s a hell of a lot of time. Can you believe it? We hardly can. It spawned a franchise that’s still going strong to this day.

SUPERHOT VR was our next title and it turned out to be more fun, more successful, and more amazing than we ever hoped.

On Quest, we recently hit a couple of incredible SUPERHOT VR milestones. 1 million copies sold and over 10k reviews. We could not be happier and more thankful for the love you have shown us.

To help celebrate we’re going to be discounting SUPERHOT VR on Quest in the coming days. Tell your friends. Spread the system.

For the curious, check our out website superhotgame.com if you want to delve into the SUPERHOT story so far.

Sincerest thanks once again to all our fans, our players and everyone involved in everything SUPERHOT. You are the best.

Always and forever, 
SUPERHOT Team

node.reviewDescription:
Respectfully. I’ve been diagnosed with Treatment Resistant Depression. I’ve struggled all my life. I’ve thought about suicide and self medicated. 
With proactivity and the use of mental health professionals, that combination with the VR community has given me a second chance. 
No
Joke.

So respectfully.
If you think this game has any semblance to real life. Any suggestive tone not unlike that of metal music “making” people commit the same result. 

You fellows,

Have some serious hang ups. 
I’d strongly suggest you reconsider reviewing this game on that basis. 

I’ll go further and say that this is one of my FAVORITE games, like EVER.

So please don’t bad mouth it because of your hang ups. 

Try not to censor your whole life with worries. 

Go shoot some anthropomorphic polygons in the shape of sentient beings.

Yeesh.

It’ll make you feel good, and for more of that, do a Tripp session (on the oculus App Store) and get in touch with reality and some inner peace. 

To justify my 5 stars not on the basis of criticism, here goes:

You use tactics, and strategy, and a lot of yoga exercises to kick major buttoms and feel like a Superman. This game. Rules. My. Life. 
When are we getting updates and extra levels? Replay value is amazing!!!
node.reviewTitle: In response to the 1 star reviews

website_page_meta.description:
《SUPERHOT VR》 这款主视角射击游戏，打通了小心谋划策略与大胆搏杀进击之间的界限。在游戏中，人前进时，时间才前进。



“《SUPERHOT VR》让你感到热血沸腾” 
- Polygon

“就像一场美妙的死亡芭蕾” 
- Gamespot


赢得了数十项年度虚拟现实游戏大奖，成为了PC和主机的VR游戏典型，《SUPERHOT VR》现已为Oculus Quest精心重制。这是史上最好的《SUPERHOT》了。

没有缆绳，没有限制，没有妥协。
让系统释放你的自由。
website_page_meta.title: SUPERHOT VR · Oculus Quest
